table.name: vtiger_salesapprovals
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesapprovals` ( `salesapprovalsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `month` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentapproval` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `advtapproved` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `advtdesigned` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `copy_delivered` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `tabid` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `salesorder` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesapprovalsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_salesapprovalscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesapprovalscf` ( `vtiger_salesapprovalscf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_salesapprovalscf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
